item.description:
I hear that there is quite the rivalry in the ranks of NASCAR and NHRA.
But that is nothing compared to the high wing / low wing rivalry we have here at KFIT
Now I am sure there is a way to solve this hmmmm.

How a bout a friendly race to see who is faster or can maneuver better or out perform
But……………


ON THE GROUND,,,,,, YA! A GO CART RACE!!!!

THAT’S THE TICKET!
FUN
EXCITING
JUVINILE
JUST UP OUR ALLEY… juvenile.

The best part is we can FLY there. Ya, Ya flyin is the best part, but I still can kick your but on the cart race. Yes this is a challenge!!

So buckle up and take off on Wednesday to KEEN where a private van will pick you up at your aircraft and transport you to the racetrack ( just like Petty) where your personal race cart will be warmed up and ready to go. We will each do 2 races to see who is the best hands down!
The winner gets free water at the victory dinner that will be held at
Papagallos Restaurant & Grotto Lounge in Keene.
Followed by another best part the flight home to KFIT.

Wheels up at 6 pm
Race shortly after landing
Dinner to follow

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Rodger Petty, Kyle Bush, Don Gartlets…. They got nothing!
